name: Artist: ピロ水 | piromizu artist's painting style
description:
ピロ水(PiroMizu) Style LoRA

中文 | English

仿ピロ水的作画风格的LoRA模型。好像很适合画傲娇的样子。

权重建议值：1 (or 0.6~1.4)

基于模型：Anything-5RE

训练信息：筛选出共计348张原画（含裁剪图），迭代1044步，多分辨率智能定向迭代训练。

其他的一些建议：EasyNegative，badhandv4，CreationMix。

LoRA model imitating Piro Mizu's painting style. It seems very suitable for drawing a tsundere look.

Recommended weight value: 1 (or 0.6~1.4)

Based on model: Anything-5RE

Training information: Selected a total of 348 original drawings (including cropped images), iterated 1044 steps, and trained with multi-resolution intelligent directional iteration.

Other suggestions: EasyNegative, badhandv4, CreationMix.
